name: Late Entry Calculation
FCRM Comment Update
script:
if doc.reference_doctype == "CRM Deal" and doc.reference_name:
    ts = doc.creation  # time of new comment
    frappe.db.set_value(
        "CRM Deal",
        doc.reference_name,
        "modified",
        ts,
        update_modified=False
    )

name: ISIPL HD Ticket Customization
Hd Customer Creation
script:
if not frappe.db.get_value("HD Customer", doc.customer_name):
    frappe.get_doc(dict(doctype = 'HD Customer',customer_name = doc.customer_name)).insert()
